description:
shapez is an automation game about cutting, rotating, stacking, and painting shapes, that you extract from randomly
generated patches on an infinite canvas, without the need to manage your infinite resources or to pay for building
your factories.

0.1.1.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
- Ordered list of all locations to prevent shapesanity inconsistency
- Change buldings order, so that the rotator and mixer always come after the cutter and painter respectively
- Fixed missing parentheses when initializing WebWorld (Discord@zuils)
- Rewrote windmills in shapesanity logic
## Client mod
- Small changes in logic-based shape randomizer
- Fixed needing to restart when leaving ingame screen
- Fixed a bug about items not being properly received when entering the game (Discord@spiffersthegrand)
- Fixed wrong building flags in upgrade requirement generation (Discord@spiffersthegrand)
- Rewrote windmills in shape requirement logic
- Removed full windmill patches
## Is the mod compatible with save files that were generated with older versions?
No, because it changes randomized things
0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

0.1.2.description:
# Changelog
## Client mod
- Fixed unobtainable shape requirements (Discord@spiffersthegrand)
## Is this versions mod compatible with save files that were generated with the previous versions?
Yes, because the last version was too broken to be playable
0.1.2.title: v0.1.2

0.2.0.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
- Expanded shapesanity (Cornered 1-1, Adjacent 1-1, Cornered 2-1, Adjacent 2-1, one-shaped four colors, one-colored four shapes)
- Added shape bundles for current level and random upgrade 
- Set shapesanity minimum to 4
- Added option to make balancer, tunnel, and trash appear earlier
- Added simple Testbase
- Fixed spoiler log not generating paths
- Added Locked/Throttled Building Traps and Malfunctioning Trap
- Added Throughput levels ratio option
## Client mod
- Expanded shapesanity (Cornered 1-1, Adjacent 1-1, Cornered 2-1, Adjacent 2-1, one-shaped four colors, one-colored four shapes)
- Added shape bundles for current level and random upgrade 
- Inventory drain traps now randomly drain either blueprint shapes, current level requirement, or random current upgrade requirement
- Fixed error with pieces in shapesanity analyzer (Discord@spiffersthegrand)
- Added extra text to some items when received
- Added Locked/Throttled Building Traps and Malfunctioning Trap
- Added functionality for Throughput levels ratio option
- Reduced amount of popups when receiving multiple items at once
- Packed locations for level 1 and level 20 into one packet
## Is this versions mod compatible with save files that were generated with the previous version?
No, because the Throuput levels ratio option changes randomized things (and might lead to NaN values)
0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

0.2.1.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
- Renamed duplicate entrance names
- 2 new options presets
- Fixed problems with unit tests
- Renamed upgrade categories
- Enhanced some options docs
- Cleaned unnecessary option.value calls
- Fixed wrong game info doc name
- Fixed item description dict key for Rotator (180°)
- Fixed illegal value in minimum checks preset
- Fixed type annotation compatibility for python 3.8
- Finished web docs
## Client mod
- Fixed automatic items receiving when connecting in main menu, leading to errors
- Renamed upgrade categories
- Fixed wires layer being inaccessible
- Fixed traps with duration carrying over to other save files
- Fixed bundles not triggering shapesanity
- Added resyncLocationChecks() for later use
- Added shapesanity cache to reduce unnecessary code execution
## Is this versions mod compatible with save files that were generated with the previous version?
I think yes, but not sure (because of renaming upgrade categories)
0.2.1.title: v0.2.1

0.3.0.description:

## APWorld
- Cleaned Choice options comparison
- Added lock belt and extractor option
- Reworked and added logic types:
  - Level logic types naming
  - Level logic type "linear"
  - Level logic type "random"
  - Upgrade logic type "category"
  - Upgrade logic type "category random"
## Client mod
- Cleaned Choice options comparison
- Added lock belt and extractor option
- Fixed Processors Upgrades receiving error (Discord@paladinoftyr)
- Added logic types:
  - Level logic type "linear"
  - Level logic type "random"
  - Upgrade logic type "category"

~~Yes~~ No, because slot data was changed

# Changelog
## APWorld
- Fixed error from unused import
- Fixed level logic type random phase calculation
- Fixed late upgrade logic in category types
- Changed some rich text in options docs
- Renamed level logic type random to random_steps
## Client mod

Yes, because the last version just didn't work

0.4.0.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Content
- Added support for Universal Tracker (by @axxroytovu)
- Added remaining single layer shapesanity
- Re-added achievement locations (including darkmode achievement)
- Added options preset "Most Vanilla"
- Updated docs
- Added Switch item and Level 20 Additional 2 location
### Bug fixes
- Fixed upgrade requirement logic causing corrupted save files
### Technical stuff
- Added logic to "Efficiency III" goal
- Rewrote region connections + added building variants
- Changed client seed range
## Client mod
### Content
- Added remaining one-layer shapesanity
- Made building variants placable without default variant
- Added optional split inventory draining traps
- Added player and location info to single received items
- Added Achievements
- Added Level 20 Additional 2 location
### Bug fixes
- Fixed level and upgrade requirements not resetting while game opened (Discord@kavinkul)
- Fixed upgrade requirement duplicates causing corrupted save files (+other small tweaks) (Discord@kavinkul)
- Traps afflicting buildings now mostly affect unlocked ones
- Reduced "Efficiency III" goal amount to 128
- Adjusted upgrade shapes bundle to mostly give shapes that are needed
- Fixed switch not being unlockable
### Technical stuff
- Replaced game-generated seed with apworld-generated seed
- Fixed unnecessary item packet listeners
## Is this versions mod compatible with save files that were generated with the previous version?
No
0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

0.4.1.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Bug fixes
- Fixed quad cutter logic (because of horizontal halves)
- Fixed blueprint achievements logic requiring blueprint shapes to be producable
- Fixed wrong names of 2-sided singles shapesanity (@axxroytovu)
- Fixed draining traps never being generated
### Technical stuff
- Made shapesanity logic more precise
## Client mod
### Bug fixes
- Fixed undefined data when accidentally opening a vanilla save file
- Fixed wires crossing being inaccessible (@axxroytovu)
- Fixed shapesanity chache not resetting between saves (@threeandthreee)
- Fixed weird item receiving shenanigans (causing some items to not be received properly)
- Goals now also resync
### Technical stuff
- Client now sets status to playing when ingame state entered
- Efficiency III goal now only tries once every 5 seconds instead of with every delivered shape
## Is this versions mod compatible with save files that were generated with the previous version?
Yes
0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

0.5.0.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Content
- Reworked shapesanity locations to reduce the datapackage (Credits to @axxroytovu for the solution)
- Reduced maximum goal_amount to 500 (1000 upgrades per tier are unnecessary)
### Technical stuff
- Added more tests
## Client mod
### Content
- Added interface for Shapesanity location checklist (Credits to @dengr1065 and Discord@emnresu for troubleshooting)
### Bug fixes
- Made upgrade shape bundles tend to not choose the current level shape
- Added backwards compatibility
## Is this versions mod compatible with older save files and apworlds?
Save files created with 0.4.x and apworlds completely backwards compatible
0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

0.5.10.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Technical stuff
- Forced balancers, tunnel, and trash to not appear in UT regen
## Client mod
### QoL
- Changed shapesanity box to AP box with multiple tabs
  - Added slot details tab
  - Added to-be-implemented tabs for achievements checklist and gift shop
### Bug fixes
- Fixed resyncing `Level 20 Additional 2` after reconnect (Discord@calmay)
- Fixed error in linear upgrade logic (Discord@lupisdragon)
### Technical stuff
- Added more debug output for `checkLocation()`
- Updated `archipelago.js` to version `1.2.0`
## Is this versions mod compatible with older save files and apworlds?
0.5.3-0.5.9 apworlds and 0.5.9 save files
However, upgrade requirements will change if upgrade logic was set to linear
0.5.10.title: v0.5.10

0.5.11.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Content
- Added `complexity_growth_gradient` option
- Added `dopamine(_overflow)` level logic types
### QoL
- Added item groups
- Changed Range options to NamedRange, giving those options some names for common values
- Added location descriptions for webhost
### Bug fixes
- Fixed access rule for the `Faster` achievement when using upgrade logic type `category_random`
## Client mod
### Content
- Added `complexity_growth_gradient` option
- Added `dopamine(_overflow)` level logic types
### QoL
- Added pin buttons to shapesanity
- Added shape details button to shapesanity
### Bug fixes
- Fixed opened upgrade hud not updating upon receiving an upgrade
### Technical stuff
- Changed complexity distribution to be consistent between different level logic types
## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds and save files?
- apworlds back to 0.5.3
  - 0.5.3 might be dropped in the future
- Only new save files without any issues
  - Back to 0.5.6 will result in different shape requirements
  - Even older save files will not auto reconnect on first loading after updating
  - Older than 0.5.3 is completely incompatible
0.5.11.title: v0.5.11

0.5.12.description:

## APWorld
The hotfix fixes a small bug making `Range` features crash the generator. Don't forget to rename the hotfix to `shapez.apworld`!
### QoL
- Added `Range` features to `ComplexityGrowthGradient`
- Undid some `NamedRange` options back to `Range` options
## Client mod
### QoL
- Changed tier II upgrade requirements of upgrade logic type `linear` to have 1 complexity instead of 0
  - now includes uncolored stars and uncolored half windmill half rectangle
## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds and save files?
- apworlds back to 0.5.3
  - 0.5.3 might be dropped in the future
- Only new save files without any issues
  - Back to 0.5.6 could result in different shape requirements
  - Even older save files will not auto reconnect on first loading after updating
  - Older than 0.5.3 is completely incompatible

0.5.3.description:

## APWorld
### Technical stuff

- Cleanups from reviews (including some for better readability)
- Added max_levels_and_upgrades value for easier adjusting
- Replaced shapesanity pool generator with pregenerated json file
## Client mod

0.5.4.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Bug fixes
- Fixed region placing for levels and upgrades if not randomized
- Fixed randomized buildings order for levels and upgrades not being randomized at all
### Technical stuff
- Changed shapesanity_pool from json to py
- More comments
- Other cleanups for better readability
- Added tests for world instance specific attributes
- Removed placeholder values from world instance specific attributes
- Moved max_levels_and_uprgades and max_shapesanity ("datapackage options") to easy-to-edit json file ("datapackage options") (Credits to @qwint)
- Added tutorial for changing datapackage options
- Add belt and extractor to precollected if not locked
- Locking belt and extractor while achievements not being included now raises an OptionError
## Client mod
### Content
- Implemented translations system (starting with english and german)
### Bug fixes
- Fixed vanilla throughput ratio levels being offset in some logic types (@JCBoorgo)
- Fixed throughput_levels_ratio being treated as -1 if set to 0 (@JCBoorgo)
- Fixed mismatching shapesanity names (Discord@rhythmic.rugan)
- Fixed error when receiving items that select a random upgrade requirement while having at least one uprgade category maxed out (Discord@dragion)
### Technical stuff
- Removed most of current backwards compatibility because of issues with removing `lock_belt_and_extractor`
## Is this versions mod compatible with older save files and apworlds?
Only compatible with 0.5.3 of both apworld and client
0.5.4.title: v0.5.4

0.5.5.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
No changes, same as 0.5.4
## Client mod
### Content
- Added per-belt statistics to relevant buildings (suggested by Discord@kavinkul)
- Changed placeholder level completing notification to custom
- Improved shapesanity translations
### Bug fixes
- Fixed sound not playing when unlocking an upgrade
### Technical stuff
- Added convenient error displaying
- Locked building traps now tend to not lock already trap-locked buildings
- Reworked shape amount requirements for levels
## Is this versions mod compatible with older save files and apworlds?
0.5.3 and 0.5.4 of both apworld and client mod.
However, be aware that some save files will now have different required shapes amounts for levels than before.
0.5.5.title: v0.5.5

0.5.6.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Content
- Added `allow_floating_layers` option
### Docs
- Added Universal Tracker to optional software in setup docs
### QoL
- Small upgrade regions change (see client changelog)
- Enhanced item classifications based on player options
## Client mod
### Content
- Auto connecting when loading an AP save file
  - Returning to main menu now automatically disconnects
  - Connection details can be overwritten by connecting in main menu before loading the save file
- Added the option to allow (possible) floating layers if cutter, rotator, and stacker are available
### QoL
- Input box content is now saved and reloaded when opening the game or returning to the main menu
- Implemented complexity-based shape generation (idea by @JCBoorgo)
- Added `RuRuWuWu` to unprocessed unpainted shape requirements
  - Changed upgrade logic types `category` and `category random` to account for that
- Trying to copy buildings without having blueprints received now gives a custom error message
### Bug fixes
- Fixed upgrade shapes bundle description
- Fixed 4-layered shape requirements never generating and too many duplicate layers (Discord@zuils, Discord@spiffersthegrand, Discord@kavinkul, @FarisTheAncient)
### Technical stuff
- Prevent other mods from overwriting level definitions
- `currentIngame.translated` changed to initialization upon initializing `Ingame` object
- Reworked some ui related stuff
- Commented out some unnecessary data saving (what I had planned wouldn't work anyway)
## Is this versions mod compatible with older save files and apworlds?
0.5.3-0.5.5 apworlds, but no older save files
0.5.6.title: v0.5.6

0.5.7.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Technical stuff
- Added compact merger and splitter as alternatives to belts in logic
- Renamed `Belt and Extractor` region entrance to `Transportation`
## Client mod
### QoL
- Added console commands for debugging
  - Objects: `connection`, `currentIngame`, `receiveItemFunctions`, `shapez`, `modImpl`
  - Function: `printLevels()`, `sendAPMessage()`, `debugCheck()`, `testError()`
### Bug fixes
- Fixed impossible shapes appearing when floating layers are included
### Technical stuff
- Implemented task-based shape generation
## Is this versions mod compatible with older save files and apworlds?
0.5.3-0.5.6 apworlds, but no older save files
0.5.7.title: v0.5.7

0.5.9.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Technical stuff
- Changed some access rules in upgrade logic types `category` and `category_random`
## Client mod
### Bug fixes
- Fixed shape generating with infinite layers, leading to infinite loading (Discord@echosem)
### Technical stuff
- Reworked layer generator algorithm
  - This also fixes a rare bug leading to an empty shape (Discord@kavinkul)
  - Includes some checks to reduce wasting complexity
- Changed some required shapes in upgrade logic types `category` and `category_random`
- Reduced some boilerplate code and added some documentation in `requirement_definitions.js`
## Is this versions mod compatible with older save files and apworlds?
0.5.3-0.5.8 apworlds, but no older save files
0.5.9.title: v0.5.9

0.6.0.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Content
- Added toolbar shuffling option
- Added `Inflation Trap` item
- Added whacky upgrades
  - Gigantic upgrades (adding 10 to speed multiplier)
  - Rising upgrades (doubling the speed multiplier)
  - Upgrade traps (subtracting 3 from speed multiplier)
  - Demonic upgrade traps (halving the speed multiplier)
  - Big/Small random upgrades (adding 2 or 0.2 to speed multiplier of random category)
### QoL
- Added recommended ingame setting to setup docs (disabling `HINTS & TUTORIALS`)
- Added missing buildings to item groups (Discord@erbs.)
- Included chaining extractor in logic
### Bug fixes
- Fixed the shapesanity location group containing achievement locations
### Technicalities
- Stored all string with potential of reoccurence in data subfolder (partly)
- Reworked random filler and trap helper function for easier adjustment
- Changed `get_filler_item_name()` to generate more than just bundles
- Reworked determining item classification in item table

## Client mod
### Content
- Added toolbar shuffling (optional)
### QoL
- Added sender name to PrintJSON packets in console output
### Bug fixes
- Fixed extractors being placeable via pipette even when locked (Discord@aeromaze)
- Fixed a rare bug making impossible shapes appear when floating layers are allowed
- Fixed all following items not being received after only 1 item throws an error
- Fixed efficiency_iii goal not working in dev environment
### Known Issues
- Receiving inflation traps leads to minor graphical bugs if received early

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds and save files?
- APWorlds back to 0.5.3
  - 0.5.3 might be dropped in the future
- Only new save files without any issues
  - Back to 0.5.6 could result in different shape requirements under certain circumstances
    - It's still recommended to update if you encounter bugs
  - Even older save files will not auto reconnect on first loading after updating
  - Older than 0.5.3 is completely incompatible
0.6.0.title: v0.6.0 (whacky update)

0.6.1.description:
**The client mod hotfix fixes a small issue regarding required shape amounts.**

# Changelog
## APWorld
### Bug fixes
- Fixed achievement logic (multiple out of logic and softlock possibilities)
- Fixed possible softlocks from upgrade traps and late throughput levels
- Fixed possible softlocks from missing belt upgrades at late throughput levels
### Technicalities

- Stored all strings with potential of reoccurence in data subfolder (remaining files)

## Client mod

- Added a notification for unexpected disconnecting
### Bug fixes
- Fixed achievements not working if connected via save file

- Fixed graphic bugs from inflation traps

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds and save files?
- APWorlds back to 0.5.3
  - 0.5.3 might be dropped in the future
- Only new save files without any issues
  - Back to 0.5.6 could result in different shape requirements under certain circumstances
    - It's still recommended to update if you encounter bugs
  - Even older save files will not auto reconnect on first loading after updating
  - Older than 0.5.3 is completely incompatible
0.6.1.title: v0.6.1 (softlock fixing update)

0.6.2.description:
# Changelog
The first hotfix includes two important bugfixes that were not known during initial release of this update.
The second hotfix fixes a small visual bug regarding the new belts clearing trap

## APWorld
### Gameplay
- Added `Belts Clearing Trap`

## Client mod
### Gameplay
- Added `Belts Clearing Trap`
### QoL
- Made windmills in the shape generator more rare
- Added `Clear belts of shapes and colors` button to slot details box
### Bug fixes
- Fixed the inconsistent bug letting level shapes bundles trying to give negative amounts of shapes (credits for helping to Discord@osiris.3)
- Fixed aptry not catching errors
  - This also fixes crashing items preventing other items from being received (Discord@osiris.3)
- Fixed connection details being erased from save file if automatic connecting failed
- Fixed excluded achievements still being included in tracker box
- Fixed `even_fasterer` goal not working because of upgrade levels being stored starting with 0 internally (Discord@yellatin)
- Fixed `Adjacent 2-1-1` shapesanity locations not being registered if the adjacent parts were faced right (@axxroytovu)
### Technicalities
- Cleaned up unused imports
- Fixed a potential location with id 0 being uncheckable
- Reduced network traffic for checking (and resyncing) locations that are already checked

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds and save files?
- APWorlds back to 0.5.3
  - 0.5.3 might be dropped in the future
- Only new save files without any issues
  - Back to 0.5.6 could result in different shape requirements under certain circumstances
    - It's still recommended to update if you encounter bugs
  - Even older save files will not auto reconnect on first loading after updating
  - Older than 0.5.3 is completely incompatible
0.6.2.title: v0.6.2 (shapes bundle fixing update)

0.6.3.title: v0.6.3 (The "I got an alarming email" update)

alpha.description:
# Changelog (initial release)
## APWorld
### Locations
- Levels (up to 1000, with additional for levels 1 and 20)
- Upgrades (up to 999 per tier)
- Shapesanity (up to 2144)
- (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED BUT IT'S ALREADY CODED) Achievements (up to 44)
### Items
- Buildings and other gameplay mechanics unlocked by levels in the base game
- Upgrades (adding either 1 or .1 to the speed multiplier of certain buildings)
- Blueprint shapes bundles (adding 1000 (vanilla) blueprint shapes to the hub)
- Inventory draining trap (removing half of stored blueprint shapes)
### Logic
The logic consists of the five main buildings (cutter, rotator, stacker, painter, and mixer) being in a (randomized) order that determines, how (random) shape requirements are generated. The logical minimum to complete the game is having those five buildings, but some other buildings are declared as progressive, if they speed up the gameplay by a lot or are required for achievements.
### Options
- Goal (Vanilla, MAM, Even fasterer, Efficiency III)
- Goal amount (range)
- Required shapes multiplier (range)
- Randomize level requirements (bool)
- Randomize upgrade requirements (bool)
- Randomize level logic (vanilla, shuffled, stretched vanilla, stretched shuffled, hardcore)
- Randomize upgrade logic (vanilla-like, linear, hardcore)
- Same late upgrade requirements (bool)
- Traps percentage (range)
## Client mod
- Everything already mentioned in "APWorld" implemented
- Input box for connecting with the server in main menu
- Simple windmill shape patches can generate near spawn
## Is the mod compatible with multiworlds that were generated with older versions?
No, because there are no older versions
alpha.title: v0.1.0 (initial release)
